column4: is there anyway to "restart" apt , i cant use it anymore cause it run into problems when i tried to install a package and now i cant use it
you fix the problem or it will always complain. forever
i susected so , however ,this occured when i run apt-get install splashy, what can i do?
thank you , i removed it sucesfuly, do you have any idea how to fix splashy?
read the splashy docs how to actually use it
the problem is that is wont install...
do you know anythig about sound in hardy, i cant get any, i tried switching from alsa to pulse but to no avail,also couldnt google anything useful
00:1b.0 Audio device: Intel Corporation 82801G (ICH7 Family) High Definition Audio Controller (rev 01)
thank you, where do i go from here ?
to your logs to check any possible alsa problems. also run a alsa mixer to check volume settins
thank you , i found a good guide to intel sound cards on ubuntu here https://help.ubuntu.com/community/HdaIntelSoundHowto. its working now!
